text:
e="preserve">Gary Liddell (27 August 1954 – 1 May 2015) was a Scottish professional footballer who played as a striker. He played from 1972 and 1983 for the teams Leeds United, Grimsby Town, Hearts and Doncaster Rovers.
Liddell was born in Stirling. His son, Andy (born 1973), was also a footballer.
Liddell died on 1 May 2015 in Falkirk, aged 60.
